Process Single Formula for World Panel Data

Source: R/wp_data.r
in_data_one_formula.Rd

Internal function that processes a single formula for multiple countries, handling data loading, frequency adjustments, and formula evaluation.

Used by: wp_data Uses: in_extract_symbols, in_determine_symbol_frequencies, in_check_missing_data, in_adjust_columns_to_frequency, in_create_symbol_environment, in_create_country_result

Features:

  • Single formula processing

  • Multi-country handling

  • Mixed frequency support

  • Formula evaluation

  • Data validation

  • Reference preservation

  • Missing data detection

  • Seasonal adjustment option

Usage

in_data_one_formula(
  countries,
  formula,
  variable,
  data,
  adjust_seasonal = FALSE,
  reference = TRUE,
  matching_yq = "Q2Y",
  interpolation_method = "Linear",
  verbose = TRUE,
  debug = FALSE
)

Arguments

countries

character vector; ISO codes

formula

character; mathematical expression

variable

character; name for formula output

data

data.frame; filtered dataset

adjust_seasonal

logical; apply seasonal adjustment

reference

logical; include source citations

matching_yq

character; method for mixed frequencies

interpolation_method

character; Y2Q conversion method

verbose

logical; print processing information

debug

logical; print debug information

Value

data.frame containing processed data with columns: ISO, Date, Variable, Value, Reference (if reference=TRUE)
